# Arcane Sight, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 244

This spell functions like *[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]**,* except that you automatically know which spells or magical effects are active upon any individual or object you see.

Unlike *[[Arcane Sight (Spell)|arcane sight]]*, this spell cannot be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

**Mythic Rule**

If you concentrate on a specific creature within 120 feet of you as a standard action, you may expend two uses of mythic power to identify every spell and spell-like ability a creature currently has available for use.

**Source:** Mythic Magic: Core Spells (Legendary Games), pg. 30
